plugins.name: Hello Cloud Plugin
plugins.description: A simple cloud plugin that adds a [hello_cloud] shortcode to display a styled greeting.
plugins.author: xAI

plugins.name: Test Banner Plugin
plugins.description: Displays a visible banner at the top of the page for testing Cloud Plugins Manager
plugins.author: Test Author

plugins.name: Floating Button Plugin
plugins.description: Shows a floating button at the bottom-right corner for testing Cloud Plugins Manager
plugins.author: Test Author

plugins.name: Footer Message Plugin
plugins.description: Displays a footer message for testing Cloud Plugins Manager
plugins.author: Test Author

plugins.name: Box Grid Plugin
plugins.description: Displays a grid of three colored boxes for testing Cloud Plugins Manager
plugins.author: Test Author
